maml:description.maml:para: Search for Vagrant Cloud Boxes This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. This will search and find Vagrant Cloud boxes utilizing a variety of arguments

maml:Description.maml:para: The search query. Results will match the username, name, or short_description fields for a box. If omitted, the top boxes based on sort and order will be returned (defaults to "downloads desc").
Filter results to boxes supporting for a specific provider.
The field to sort results on. Can be one of "downloads", "created", or "updated". Defaults to "downloads".
The order to return the sorted field in. Can be "desc" os "asc". Defaults to "desc".
The number of results to return (max of 100). Defaults to "100".
Specify pages. Defaults to "1".
The search query. Results will match the username, name, or short_description fields for a box. If omitted, the top boxes based on sort and order will be returned (defaults to "downloads desc").
Filter results to boxes supporting for a specific provider.
The field to sort results on. Can be one of "downloads", "created", or "updated". Defaults to "downloads".
The order to return the sorted field in. Can be "desc" os "asc". Defaults to "desc".
The number of results to return (max of 100). Defaults to "100".
Specify pages. Defaults to "1".

dev:remarks.maml:para: Run a wildcard query.
Query a specific username, and list the boxes. In this example, username is 'hashicorp'. Since the object returns the 'name' object in collapsed form, we need to expand the property to list it.
Query the 'hashicorp' username for all boxes that use the 'vmware' provider.
Query the 'hashicorp' username for all boxes that use the 'aws' provider and list the name, createddate and updateddate fields.

maml:description.maml:para: Sends a 2FA code to the requested delivery method. Supports only sms at this time
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. Sends a 2FA code to the requested deliver method.
This command is used in conjunction with New-VagrantCloudAPIToken when using the Enable2FA switch.
IMPORTANT: This will error out if two-factor authentication hasn't been enabled on the Vagrant Cloud dashboard!

dev:remarks.maml:para: This will send a 2FA code via sms

maml:description.maml:para: Validates a API token located in the Vagrant Cloud. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. This function validates token on the Vagrant Cloud.

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns information from Vagrant Cloud on the specified api token.

maml:description.maml:para: Gathers information on a Vagrant Box located in the Vagrant Cloud. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. This function gathers information on a Vagrant Box in the Vagrant Cloud.

maml:Description.maml:para: Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns information from Vagrant Cloud on the specified box.

maml:description.maml:para: Updates a Vagrant Box on the Vagrant Cloud with new information. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. This will update Vagrant Box details on the Vagrant Cloud. This does not update box versions. Use Set-VagrantCloudBoxVersion instead.

maml:Description.maml:para: Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
A version incremental number. Uses Semantic Versioning. See related links for details. Alias: version
Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
A version incremental number. Uses Semantic Versioning. See related links for details. Alias: version

dev:remarks.maml:para: Gets the Vagrant Box Version object.
Gets the Vagrant Box, win2016core with the specified version 1.0.1547129422

maml:description.maml:para: Retrieves data on an organization. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. Retrieves data on an organization.

maml:Description.maml:para: {{Fill VagrantCloudUser Description}}
{{Fill VagrantCloudUser Description}}

dev:remarks.maml:para: Retrieves data on an organization.

maml:description.maml:para: Gathers information on a Vagrant Provider located in the Vagrant Cloud. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. Gathers information on a Vagrant Provider located in the Vagrant Cloud.

maml:Description.maml:para: Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Provider Name Alias: provider
The Box Name Alias: name
{{Fill VagrantCloudBoxVersion Description}}
Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Provider Name Alias: provider
The Box Name Alias: name
{{Fill VagrantCloudBoxVersion Description}}

dev:remarks.maml:para: Returns information from Vagrant Cloud on the specified provider.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new Vagrant Cloud API Token.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. This function creates a new Vagrant Cloud API Token.

maml:Description.maml:para: The provider used by the Vagrant box Alias: description
A two-factor authentication code. Required to use this API method if 2FA is enabled. Use New-Enable2FA to request a code. Alias: 2facode
The provider used by the Vagrant box Alias: description
A two-factor authentication code. Required to use this API method if 2FA is enabled. Use New-Enable2FA to request a code. Alias: 2facode

dev:remarks.maml:para: Below is an example specifying values at the console window.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a new Vagrant Box on the Vagrant Cloud. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. This function creates a new Vagrant Box on the Vagrant Cloud.

maml:Description.maml:para: Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
A short description of the Vagrant Box, i.e, 'Windows Server 2019' Alias: short_description
Optional. Determines whether the box is a public or private box. Accepts boolean values. DEFAULT IS PRIVATE. A Vagrant Cloud subscription is required to use private boxes. Alias: is_private
Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
A short description of the Vagrant Box, i.e, 'Windows Server 2019' Alias: short_description
Optional. Determines whether the box is a public or private box. Accepts boolean values. DEFAULT IS PRIVATE. A Vagrant Cloud subscription is required to use private boxes. Alias: is_private

dev:remarks.maml:para: Below is an example specifying values at the console window.
Creates a new box. One can also use a hashtable and splat the values as well.

maml:description.maml:para: Creates a version object for a Vagrant Box on the Vagrant Cloud. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. This will create a Vagrant Box version on the Vagrant Cloud.

maml:Description.maml:para: Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
A version incremental number. Uses Semantic Versioning. See related links for details. Alias: version
A short description of the Box version, i.e, 'Changes have been made to add packages' Alias: description
Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
A version incremental number. Uses Semantic Versioning. See related links for details. Alias: version
A short description of the Box version, i.e, 'Changes have been made to add packages' Alias: description

dev:remarks.maml:para: Below is an example specifying values at the console window.

maml:description.maml:para: Updates a Vagrant Box on the Vagrant Cloud with new information. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
This is a PowerShell Core wrapper for the Vagrant API. This will create a new Vagrant Box Provider on the Vagrant Cloud.

maml:Description.maml:para: Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
The name of the provider. Alias: provider
A valid URL to download this provider. If omitted, you must upload the Vagrant box image for this provider to Vagrant Cloud before the provider can be used. Alias: url
Your Vagrant Cloud Username Alias: username
Your Vagrant Box Name Alias: name
The name of the provider. Alias: provider
A valid URL to download this provider. If omitted, you must upload the Vagrant box image for this provider to Vagrant Cloud before the provider can be used. Alias: url

maml:description.maml:para: Removes a Vagrant Token from the Vagrant Cloud. This requires a Vagrant Cloud API Token to use.
